channel.title: 彭博-市场

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他将对中国公司在墨西哥生产的汽车征收 100%的关税，这比他之前表示要对美国边境以南生产的汽车征收的关税高出一倍。
item.description:
Donald Trump said he would hit cars made in Mexico by Chinese companies with a 100% tariff, double the levy he has previously said he would put on automobiles made south of the US border https://t.co/cKauOCBMd3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 16, 2024

item.title: .@kgreifeld的新ETF IQ时事通讯探讨了灰度公司的迷你GBTC计划，尽管最初的GBTC正面临数十亿美元的资金外流。

item.title: 彭博贸易追踪报告显示，面对持续的供应链中断，强劲的需求使全球货运出现了不太可能出现的反弹。
item.description:

item.title: 2023 年的 Mipim 房地产盛会充满了对市场现状的震惊和否定。今年，投资者似乎开始接受这一事实，即在负利率基础上长达十年的繁荣所播下的种子现在必须得到收获。点击此处阅读《边缘》。
item.description:
The 2023 Mipim real estate event was all about shock and denial about the state of the market. This year, investors seem to accept that the seeds sown from a decade-long boom built on negative rates must now be reaped. Read it here in The Brink. https://t.co/zRH3yB33qS

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 16, 2024

item.title: 这位 57 岁的对冲基金经理利用自己的科学知识，开发出一套交易巨灾债券的制胜法宝--由于气候变化和通货膨胀，巨灾债券市场正在蓬勃发展。阅读《大手笔》 ⬇️
item.description:
This 57-year-old hedge fund manager used his scientific knowledge to develop a winning formula for trading catastrophe bonds — a market that’s booming thanks to climate change and inflation.

Read The Big Take ⬇️ https://t.co/KWafkzflb8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 16, 2024
